content: I've been using the Walgreens app to earn points on my purchases, and I've also been taking advantage of their weekly sales to stock up on household essentials. I redeemed 5,000 points to get $5 off a purchase of $25 or more today, which was a nice discount. Do you think it's a good idea to focus on buying items that are on sale, even if they're not necessarily something I need immediately?
